trans-unit.source: Defines a stream that links data streams to cryptographic transformations.
trans-unit.target: 定义将数据流链接到加密转换的流。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime uses a stream-oriented design for cryptography.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时使用面向流的设计进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The core of this design is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>.
trans-unit.target: 这种设计的核心是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>。

trans-unit.source: Any cryptographic objects that implement <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> can be chained together with any objects that implement <xref:System.IO.Stream>, so the streamed output from one object can be fed into the input of another object.
trans-unit.target: 任何加密对象实现<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>可以实现的任何对象以及链接<xref:System.IO.Stream>，因此可以需要一个对象的流式处理的输出传递给另一个对象的输入。

trans-unit.source: The intermediate result (the output from the first object) does not need to be stored separately.
trans-unit.target: 中间结果 （从第一个对象的输出） 不需要单独存储。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly by calling its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A> method, which in turn calls its <xref:System.IDisposable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用类型后，您应释放它的直接或间接通过调用其<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A>方法，后者反过来调用其<xref:System.IDisposable>实现。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: You should always explicitly close your <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> object after you are done using it by calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你应始终显式关闭你<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>对象都完成后使用通过调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Doing so flushes the underlying stream and causes all remaining blocks of data to be processed by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 这样刷新基础流，并使所有剩余数据的处理块<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>对象。

trans-unit.source: However, if an exception occurs before you call the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> object might not be closed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你在调用之前，则会发生异常<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>对象可能不会关闭。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method always gets called, place your call to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A> method within the `finally` block of a `try`/`catch` statement.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>始终调用方法，请将放到调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Clear%2A>方法内的`finally`块`try` / `catch`语句。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> to encrypt a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>加密字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> class with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key%2A> and initialization vector (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>使用指定的类<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key%2A>和初始化向量 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The stream on which to perform the cryptographic transformation.
trans-unit.target: 对其执行加密转换的流。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic transformation that is to be performed on the stream.
trans-unit.target: 要对流执行的加密转换。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> class with a target data stream, the transformation to use, and the mode of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 用目标数据流、要使用的转换和流的模式初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Any object that derives from <xref:System.IO.Stream> can be passed into the `stream` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 派生自任何对象<xref:System.IO.Stream>可传入`stream`参数。

trans-unit.source: Any object that implements <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform> (such as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>) can be passed into the `transform` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 实现任何对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform>(如<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>) 可将传入`transform`参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> is readable.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 是否可读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current stream is readable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前流可读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether you can seek within the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示你是否可以在当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 中搜索。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Seeking is not enabled in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>, so this method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 查找中未启用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>，因此此方法始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> is writable.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 是否可写。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current stream is writable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前流可写，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: This method wraps a call to the type's <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会包装类型的调用<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>实现。

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>可以重新分配用于其他目的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize` 将释放设置为 `Dispose`，调用 `false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see langword="Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see langword="Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Clears all buffers for the current stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: 清理当前流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

trans-unit.source: Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Flush%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 刷新流将不会刷新其基础的编码器，除非你明确地调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.Flush%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.AutoFlush%2A>到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但不是会刷新编码器状态。

trans-unit.source: This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。

trans-unit.source: This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况下会影响 UTF8 和 UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。

trans-unit.source: You should call either the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A> method to complete flushing the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 你应通过调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A>方法以完成刷新缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears all buffers for the current stream asynchronously, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 异步清理当前流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备，并且监控取消请求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: You must preface your call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushAsync%2A> with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在调用之前添加<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushAsync%2A>与`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic 中) 运算符可暂停执行方法，直到完成该任务为止。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: Updates the underlying data source or repository with the current state of the buffer, then clears the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用缓冲区的当前状态更新基础数据源或存储库，随后清除缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method will call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法将调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>, call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A> to complete flushing the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果不调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>，调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A>完成刷新缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A> only when all stream activity is complete.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A>流的所有活动都时才完成。

trans-unit.source: The key is corrupt which can cause invalid padding to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 密钥已损坏，它可能会导致流的填充无效。

trans-unit.source: The current stream is not writable.
trans-unit.target: 当前流不可写。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The final block has already been transformed.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个块已被转换。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the final buffer block has been written to the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示最终缓冲区块是否已写入基础流。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the final block has been flushed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已刷新最终块，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is set `true` when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性`true`时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length in bytes of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取用字节表示的流长度。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property exists only to support inheritance from <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的存在只是为了支持从 <xref:System.IO.Stream> 继承；无法使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property exists only to support inheritance from <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的存在只是为了支持从 <xref:System.IO.Stream> 继承；无法使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组。

trans-unit.source: A maximum of <c>count</c> bytes are read from the current stream and stored in <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流中读取最多 <c>count</c> 个字节，并将它们存储在 <c>buffer</c> 中。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的字节偏移量，从此位置开始存储从当前流中读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 要从当前流中最多读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流读取字节序列，并将流中的位置向前移动读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 读入缓冲区中的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前可用的字节数没有请求的字节数那么多，则总字节数可能小于请求的字节数；如果已到达流的末尾，则为零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode" /> associated with current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> object does not match the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 与基础流不匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, this exception is thrown when using <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode.Read" /> with an underlying stream that is write only.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对只写的基础流使用 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode.Read" /> 时会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="offset" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="count" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: Thesum of the <paramref name="count" /> and <paramref name="offset" /> parameters is longer than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 参数和 <paramref name="offset" /> 参数的和比缓冲区的长度长。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write the data into.
trans-unit.target: 数据写入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的字节偏移量，从该偏移量开始写入流中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 最多读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream asynchronously, advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流异步读取字节序列，将此流中的位置提升读取的字节数，并监视取消请求数。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步读取操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The value of the task object's <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 目标对象的 <paramref name="TResult" /> 参数的值包含多次读入缓冲区总字节数。

trans-unit.source: The result can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前可用字节数少于所请求的字节数，则该结果值可能小于所请求的字节数，或者如果已到达流的末尾时，则为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: You must preface your call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.ReadAsync%2A> with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在调用之前添加<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.ReadAsync%2A>与`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic 中) 运算符可暂停执行方法，直到完成该任务为止。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持读取。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的读取操作当前正在使用流。

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to the <c>origin</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相对于 <c>origin</c> 参数的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> object indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> 对象，该对象指示用于获得新位置的参考点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method exists only to support inheritance from <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此方法存在只是为了支持从继承<xref:System.IO.Stream>，并且不能使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 所需的当前流的长度（以字节表示）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前流的长度。

trans-unit.source: This property exists only to support inheritance from <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的存在只是为了支持从 <xref:System.IO.Stream> 继承；无法使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property exists only to support inheritance from <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, and cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的存在只是为了支持从 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 继承；无法使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This method copies <c>count</c> bytes from <c>buffer</c> to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将 <c>count</c> 个字节从 <c>buffer</c> 复制到当前流。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的字节偏移量，从此位置开始将字节复制到当前流。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 要写入当前流的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> and advances the current position within the stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 将一字节序列写入当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" />，并将通过写入的字节数提前该流的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode" /> associated with current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> object does not match the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream" /> 与基础流不匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, this exception is thrown when using <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode.Write" /> with an underlying stream that is read only.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对只读的基础流使用 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode.Write" /> 时会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="offset" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="count" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: The sum of the <paramref name="count" /> and <paramref name="offset" /> parameters is longer than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 参数和 <paramref name="offset" /> 参数的和比缓冲区的长度长。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: 从中写入数据的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> from which to begin writing bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的从零开始的字节偏移量，从此位置开始将字节写入到流。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 最多写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream asynchronously, advances the current position within the stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 将字节序列异步写入当前流，将该流的当前位置向前移动写入的字节数，并监视取消请求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: You must preface your call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.WriteAsync%2A> with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在调用之前添加<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream.WriteAsync%2A>与`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic 中) 运算符可暂停执行方法，直到完成该任务为止。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 流正在由前一次写操作使用。
